nodes.text: Hura Kogler was the Human daughter of the legendary Hyndis Kogler. Hura joined Imperial Intelligence, and led an operation to place infiltration droids in the Alliance Fleet. Posing as the pirate Shyndi Oglerk, she sold the droids to a team of Rebel Alliance operatives, who delivered them to the Alliance Intelligence flagship Shadow Raptor. The operatives thwarted the subsequent revolt and tracked their origin to Teagan. The operatives cornered Kogler and her team, capturing the agent after first mate Kog betrayed her and fled. She then tried to threaten the operatives with her father's reputation.
Hura Kogler appears in Fantasy Flight Games' roleplaying game 2014 adventure Dead in the Water.
